§cPower Locking Gaze
§3By pressing primary you lock your gaze on the player you are looking at. Press primary again to unlock. When you are gazing at a player there power is disabled unless it's a part of their body. If they walk behind blocks or glass, it stops working. 

§cPower Crystal
§3Make a power crystal by holding an empty one, then pressing primary.
